comment: She is amazing. Her class is really easy. Her Be the Change seminar is interesting and fun. She gives small amounts of work, most of which are projects or short responses to a video. She offers extra credit.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--GRADED BY FEW THINGS--Caring

comment: Overall very easy A! Only had a few assignments/tests but she doesn't really grade that strictly. Watched a lot of videos/had a lot of discussions. Sometimes her grading criteria is confusing. I would ask her to clarify, she would and somehow I would still do it wrong. She is still pretty easy though, very nice and caring.

You basically watch a bunch of videos. Don't waste your money buying the seminar book. The only test you have is the midterm, and you don't even need the book to ace that. Make sure you get your volunteer hours early on, because she won't really help you if something comes up, other than that it's hard not to get an A.

Prof Miggy is okay, but the class is so pointless. She makes you volunteer for 10 hours and write a paper on your experience, but I didn't volunteer and got a 98 on the paper soo. She grades really easily and just about every class is spent watching videos. It's an easy A

A really nice professor who is really passionate about her subject. Reasonable but not a pushover. Tests are pretty easy if you come to class+ do the study guide. There is one big group project- make sure you have a good group. Sometimes class can be boring, but it's definitely not difficult. Know due dates+how they're supposed to be submitted!

A truly amazing professor! VERY clear grading rubric, and gives plenty of bonus points. Incredibly easy to talk to, and gives great feedback on all assignment. Makes you sign in every class, and if you miss 6 classes, you get dropped a letter grade. Other than that, she will be one of the best professors you've ever had!
great teacher, she's very into what she teaches. everything is posted on D2L. very easy going. take this class for easy a.

Great professor! Class is fun and she is entertaining. Notes are on D2L but she gives more in depth info in class. Makes you sign into class everyday can only miss a few classes or your grade is lowered. 4 tests with one group project throughout the semester. a few opportunities for bonus in class  too
She is a great teacher.  Very helpful and understanding.
Great teacher!  She has a lot of experience to offer to the class and the class discussions were truly insightful!
This one of the best professors in HS dept.  She is very helpful and highly knowledgeable about her subject.  Take her class and get an A.

She was a 3rd grade teacher for 17 years so shes very easy going & kind.Lots of discussion,you only need the book for case studies.Test are SO easy if you come to class/listen.20 mult. choice & 4 essay. 3 tests (but you are only required to take 2 if you like your grades).3 case studies & only have to do 2. attendance required. Take her for an A!!!

Great Professor.  This was not a class I was really interested in but needed it as one of electives.  She made it interesting there is quite a lot of work if you take it during Maymester we had an assignment due each day but they weren't that hard just pay attention in class and you won't need the book.
Great teacher, learned alot in her class.  Would take her again for any other classes.
